name: Sumaq
description:
Sumaq is Latin-American indigenous girl who infiltrates a colonists’ camp to rescue her guinea pigs. The game is availeble now on https://vingo3105.itch.io/sumaq 

Thank you so much for playing my first game, hope you enjoy it! If you like my content please fallow me on instagram @vharce93
